message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price that I think is fair considering its value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm interested in making a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1050000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to get as close to my budget as possible.

I can see you're serious about making a deal, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering the product to you for $1050000, but I'm willing to meet you at $975000. That's as low as I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $975000, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $975000 and my previous offer of $950000. I'm thinking of $962500. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.

I understand you're trying to meet me in the middle, but I'm not willing to go below $985000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $975000 was already my best offer, but I can do $985000 is too low for me. I'll meet you at $980000, but that's my final offer.
